trans-unit.source: Here you can assign categories to the current news record (if this record is no translation of another record).
trans-unit.target: 在此,您能对当前的新闻记录指定分类(如果这个记录不是其它记录的翻译)

trans-unit.source: You can assign categories to news records that are not translations of
trans-unit.target: 您能对没有翻译的新闻记录指定分类

trans-unit.source: the field "Category" in the tt_news db-record. If a BE-user opens a record that has non-allowed categories assigned this message will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 字段"Category"在数据库tt_news 记录中.如果一个后台用户(BE-user)打开了一个不允许指定分类的记录,这个消息将会显示.
